item.title: Github Stats on your Github profile page
item.author: Murthy Udupa
item.description: Ever wondered how some GitHub profiles stand out with dynamic stats, vibrant visuals, and an interactive feel? Welcome to the art of creating a dynamic GitHub profile page! In this post, we’ll dive into showcasing your coding prowess through GitHub statistics to turn your profile into a living resume of your coding journey. Let’s make your GitHub profile not just a page, but an experience.
